summary: Adds Hotkeys 3-8 and Quick menu\'s to the 360 Pad without changing the default controls. Also includes a version for Southpaws because I am lovely.
descriptionHtml:
Place inside your Skyrim Data folder

The correct path for the file is
Skyrim/data/interface/controls/PC/controlmap.txt

Versions 1.1, 1.111 (Classic B Menu Fixed) and 1.1s (South Paw Edition)

The changed / new keys are as follows.

Favourites Menu = Back
Hotkeys 1-8 = Dpad. Up is Hotkey 1 to Clockwise round to Diagonal Upleft Hotkey 8
B = Nothing (Quick Menu Version) // Classic Menu
Wait = B+Back (Quick Menu Version) // A+Back (Classic Menu Version).
Skills = B+Up
Items = B+Left
Magic = B+Right
Map = B+Down

Magic is Right and Items is left in the quick menu version because that is the side the menu appears on. It just makes more sense.

Included in the file are the hex codes for the 360 buttons and how to use them should you wish to change them. I advise against adding a key for Quicksave+Quickload to a combination as currently setting it to any button causes it to save/load your game randomly if you press one of the buttons.

Customise Miniguide.

Open the file
CTL+F to find the button you want to change using the codes provided.
Example things that use the B button are 0x2000. To change B to X, change 0x2000 to 0x4000.
Save + Done.


Changelog

Changed Hotkeys 5-8 from X+Dpad to Diagonals. Thanks to entnvki for reminding me that Diagonals exist.
Added South Paw Edition
Added Classic Menu Edition
Killed the Demon Kirby\'s and reclaimed my tuna.
author: PS2MAN

files.name: Expanded 360 Hotkeys - Classic B Menu Fixed
